text: The Biese is a river in the German state of Saxony-Anhalt, source river of the Aland. It is the continuation of the river Milde, downstream from Beese. The Biese is long, whereas the total Milde-Biese-Aland system is long. The Biese flows into the Aland in Seehausen. ==See also== *List of rivers of Saxony- Anhalt ==References== Category:Rivers of Saxony-Anhalt Category:Rivers of Germany
title: Biese
